understanding.C: You pushed a tiny commit to retrigger pull_request_target via a synchronize event. Expect the enforcer to skip due to the runner label, and the heavy checks to re-run. I will verify the triggers, confirm enforcer skip, monitor heavy checks to completion, and report final status.

acceptance: Acknowledged. I will monitor the pull_request_target run, verify the enforcer is skipped due to the runner label, track heavy checks to completion, and report back once everything settles.
